entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this morning and ending this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
